meta.title: IT Tools Collection - Essential Toolbox for Developers
meta.description: Online tools collection designed for developers, including JSON formatting, text processing, encryption/decryption and other practical tools

home.modern_design_desc: Built with shadcn/ui, supports light/dark theme switching, providing elegant user experience
home.multilingual_desc: Supports Chinese and English interfaces to meet different language preferences
home.high_performance_desc: Based on Next.js and TypeScript, providing fast and responsive user experience
home.privacy_protection_desc: All tools run on client-side, ensuring your data privacy and security

json-formatter.name: JSON Formatter
json-formatter.description: Format, validate and minify JSON data
json-formatter.output_placeholder: Formatted JSON will be displayed here...

json-to-csv.name: JSON to CSV
json-to-csv.description: Convert JSON data to CSV format
json-to-csv.placeholder: Please enter JSON data (object array or single object)...
json-to-csv.invalid_format: Please enter valid JSON object or object array
json-to-csv.output_placeholder: Converted CSV will be displayed here...
json-to-csv.usage_array_stringify: ‚Ä¢ Array values will be converted to JSON strings
json-to-csv.usage_csv_escape: ‚Ä¢ Automatically handles CSV special character escaping
